item.title: Learning Web Development with Rails
item.description: Here are some of my notes from learning rails. I am following the course Web Application Architectures at Coursera. This is seen from perspective of someone used to more desktop applications. I used Ruby as a scripting language for writing small unix tools in the past, but I am not considering myself very up to date. Setup Project Have rails autogenerate a bunch of files for a project: $ rails new myproject This seems to be the way to create a new model class with corresponding table in database:
